name: World of Tanks - Ready For War Pack
name_original: World of Tanks - Ready For War Pack
description:
Get ahead of the curve with the Ready For War Pack! Including crew training vehicles for three major nations, premium time for faster progression and premium currency, it will give you the perfect start to your tanking career!

Bundle includes: • American Tier V M4 Improved Medium Tank • Soviet Tier VI T-34-85M Medium Tank • German Tier V Pz.Kpfw. III Ausf. K Medium Tank • 1250 Gold • 7 Days of Premium Time

NOTE: All Premium vehicles come with a 100% trained Crew, their own Garage slot, and a mix of standard and Premium ammo.
